name: HotDocs Library File
summary: File created by HotDocs digital form preparation software; saved in an XML format and contains references to resources used by the program; may reference text templates ( .WPT , .DOT , or .RTF files) called "clauses," user answers ( .ANX files), or even external Web URLs ; also contains a description for each referenced resource.
